supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 43 x 36, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 43 x 47, (A) traces of 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 64 x 30, (A) 10 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (4) 64 x 50, (A) 4 lines (?), left margin, (B) blank, (5) 49 x 31, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) 9 lines, left margin (?), (6) 43 x 16, (A) 5 lines, top margin, (B) traces, (7) 51 x 28, (A) 2 lines, top left margin, (B) 3 lines, top margin, (8) 35 x 40, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 14 x 22, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 55 x 22, (A) 1 line, left margin, (B) traces of 7 lines, (11) 61 x 25, (A) 6 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (12) 54 x 15, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin, (B) traces, (13) 64 x 10, (A) 7 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (14) 59 x 16, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, bottom margin, (15) 60 X 12, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (16) 58 x 20, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 6 lines, no margins
